description: Display lines beginning with a prefix in a sorted file. Note: the lines in the file must be sorted. See also: grep, sort. More information: https://man.openbsd.org/look.

useCases.description: Search for lines beginning with a specific prefix in a specific file:
Case-insensitively ([f]) search only on alphanumeric characters ([d]):
Specify a string [t]ermination character (space by default):
